explains: v. 使成杂色（mottle 的过去分词）

sentences.en: In the mornings the sky appeared a heavy shade of mottled grey.
sentences.cn: 清晨，天空看上去是斑驳的深灰色调。

sentences.en: One big mottled arm shot out and caught Toad by a fore-leg, while the other-gripped him fast by a hind-leg.
sentences.cn: 一只长斑点的大胳膊猛地伸出来，抓住托德的一条前腿，另一只手抓住他的一条后腿。

sentences.en: His face was mottled red and white with embarrassment.
sentences.cn: 他窘迫得脸上红一块白一块。
